item.title: Soap
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

Tbfh when I was up to the age of about 14 I always used soap at bathrooms etc, nowadays not so much.
Lynx/adidas shower gel in shower, soap after taking a crap since I’m a muslim and use a lotta(basically I clean my arse properly), whenever my hands get dirty(noticibly).
Soap dries out my skin so I try to stay away from it unless I need to. I’m generally a very clean guy though
Lynx chocolate + aftershave(sometimes) for fragrance

Read full topic

item.title: Soap
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Uncalled, post:53, topic:425055”][quote author=CodeForFame link=topic=527718.msg3854925#msg3854925 date=1324266712]
I’m also curious if the people that don’t shower at least daily work out, or get a decent amount of exercise (to the point that they sweat). If so, how can you stand the feeling of not washing off the sweat? Also, do you at least change your clothes?
[/quote]They’re straight men.[/quote]That, but also the fact that I specifically said that I shower when I can tell I need one, so obviously if I sweat I can tell and I shower…

item.title: Soap
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Personal hygiene is not looked down upon as long as it does not effect another person. If you are a very clean person then no one will think twice, but if you smell like a hobo from the 1900’s then obviously people will consider you a lower-class human. /thread

Read full topic

item.title: Soap
item.dc:creator: @CodeForFame CodeForFame
item.description:
@CodeForFame wrote:

Am I the only one who showers at least twice a day, and uses soap every time (I don’t wash my hair every time, because it will get damaged[you learn quite a bit about hair when you’re dating someone in cosmetology school], no homo)?

I also wash my hands an absurd amount…

I’m also curious if the people that don’t shower at least daily work out, or get a decent amount of exercise (to the point that they sweat). If so, how can you stand the feeling of not washing off the sweat? Also, do you at least change your clothes?

Read full topic

item.title: Soap
item.dc:creator: @Pr0ject_pvp Pr0ject pvp
item.description:
@Pr0ject_pvp wrote:

[quote=“xryz, post:38, topic:425055”][quote author=Fridder link=topic=527718.msg3848303#msg3848303 date=1323814287]

I don’t wash my hands at school.

Neither do I, I don’t think anyone washes their hands at school.
[/quote]

and how many ppl get sick at ur school? im sure the girls at ur school wash their hand, the guys may not but its gross for either gender. it doesnt matter whether you touch your junk or not you should always wash your hands after you go to the rest room. also using hand sanatizer or washing you hands with soap b4 you eat is a good idea. I almost never get sick; i wash may hands on a regular basis. It may be b/c i have a strong immune system but I don’t take daily vitamins, consume unhealthy food(eat small meals like twice a day, while snacking on snacks most the day, only drink coca-cola, don’t drink water daily or even weekly), almost never exercise, and get very little sleep(5 hr max a night). If i never washed my hands im sure I would get sick more frequently.[/quote]

At my school it’s the other way around :0

Read full topic

item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

I take a shower normally twice a day, in the mornings and afternoon. I use Dove Soap because it doesn’t dry out your skin, Suave Mint and Rosemary because it barely has any moisturizer and my hair get’s oily easily so it’s good for that. Facewash, Old Spice deodorant, and toothpaste of course.

item.title: Soap
item.dc:creator: @ox_random_xi ox random xi
item.description:
@ox_random_xi wrote:

[quote=“xryz, post:33, topic:425055”]I use axe phoenix body wash, and tresemme for my hair. I shower every other day but im sure i dont stink(would a girl braid my hair if i stunk). i dont sweat much, i don’t work, and dont do anything to get dirty. If i took shorter showers i might take one everyday but i take 15-30 minutes to shower and it take 2-4 hours for my hair(its a couple inches over 2 foot) to fully dry. I use axe phoenix deodorant.

edit: you should was your hands with soap more than 2 times a day. you should at least every time you use the restroom.[/quote]
I use hand sanatizer after every class, and wash my hands about 4-5 times in School alone.
